scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/public/css/ && echo '=> minify:css' && cleancss public/css/style.css -o dist/public/css/style.css
scripts.build:js: echo '=> minify:js' && npm run minify:public -s && npm run minify:node -s
scripts.minify:node: for d in ./ routes/ routes/*/ libs/ cron/; do mkdir -p dist/$d; for f in $d*.js; do uglifyjs $f > dist/$f; done; done;
scripts.minify:public: for d in public/js/ public/js/*/ public/js/*/*/; do mkdir -p dist/$d; for f in $d*.js; do uglifyjs $f > dist/$f; done; done;
scripts.build:img: echo '=> copy images' && cp -r public/img dist/public/img && cp -r public/favicon.ico dist/public
scripts.build:copy: echo '=> copy files' && cp -r bin views data *.json node_modules dist/ && cp -r public/lib dist/public/
scripts.build: npm run test -s && npm run clean -s && npm run build:js -s && npm run build:css -s && npm run build:img -s && npm run build:copy -s
